page.title: 10RELIGION
page.content: The following places of worship exist in this area of Malvern: Holly Mount United Reformed Church, Worcester Rd. Great Malvern, United Reformed Church, Malvern Link, Lansdowne Methodist Church, Lansdowne Crescent, Somers Park Methodist Church,West Malvern Methodist Church,The Salvation Army, Newtown Road,The Pentecostal Church, Somers Road,Malvern Evangelical Church, Pickersleigh Road,First Church of Christ Scientist, Albert Park Road *S.Joseph's Roman Catholic church, Newtown Road,*S.James West Malvern,*S. Matthias Church, The Church of the Ascension, *S.Peter Cowleigh,S. Leonard Newland,The Community of the Holy Name,Ranelagh Rd.,*Hol Trinity Church Link Top. * means there is a church school.
